title: Rebuilding Pytorch after modifying C++ code in aten library
body_html: Would python setup.py build be enough to rebuild the pytorch after changing C++/Cuda code in the aten library ? For example I would like to modify the forward and back propagation for batch normalization and I intend to make changes in BatchNormalization.cu in THC library . How would I go about rebuilding the code. I apologise in advance if the question is really trivial as I am a beginner to PyTorch :)
